prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: When will Stefan next reach out to have a meaningful conversation with me about our connection?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the methodical list of all relevant horary chart data for your question, using traditional horary principles:

1. Basic Chart Structure
 • Ascendant at 8°23′ Virgo represents you, Melissa Gale.
 • The Ascendant’s 9th House (cusp starting at 29° Aries) represents Stefan (the foreign/other connection).

2. Planetary Positions by Degree and House
 • Sun at 18°28′ Aquarius – placed in the 6th House (with Mercury and Pluto in Aquarius later noted).
 • Moon at 10°17′ Gemini – located in the 10th House (as the 10th House starts at 4° Gemini and contains the Moon and Jupiter).
 • Mercury at 16°37′ Aquarius – in the 6th House, indicating communication and mental activity.
 • Venus at 1°55′ Aries – in the 8th House (shared with Chiron) emphasizing emotional and relational bonds.
 • Mars at 18°53′ Cancer (retrograde) – positioned in the 11th House, representing active initiative and potential delays.
 • Jupiter at 11°17′ Gemini – in the 10th House, underscoring expansive influence and emotional optimism.
 • Saturn at 18°05′ Pisces – in the 7th House, indicating boundaries and long-term commitments.
 • Uranus at 23°17′ Taurus – placed in the Ascendant’s 9th House, representing Stefan and his unexpected movements or insights.
 • Neptune at 28°08′ Pisces – in the 7th House, adding a mystical or elusive quality to relationships.
 • Pluto at 2°14′ Aquarius – in the 5th House, suggesting transformative influences in creative self-expression.
 • North Node at 29°32′ Pisces (retrograde) – in the 7th House, denoting karmic or fated elements.
 • Chiron at 19°41′ Aries – in the 8th House, highlighting wounds that may require healing within intimate or shared resources.

3. Relevant Aspects (with orbs as noted)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb 0°) – reinforcing disciplined action despite potential delays.
 • Moon conjunct Jupiter (orb 1°) – a strong, benevolent aspect suggesting expansive emotional communication.
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb 1°) – indicating healing potential through clear expression.
 • Mars square Chiron (orb 1°) – a tension between action and healing that may cause delays or missteps.
 • Mercury sextile Chiron (orb 3°) – supporting candid and healing communication.
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb 2°) – emphasizing clarity and focus in communication matters.
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb 1°) and Venus sextile MC (orb 3°) – suggesting transformative relational energy that can influence public/action matters.
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb 2°) – linking destiny or fated connections to relational matters.
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb 1°) – adding a layer of spiritual or elusive quality to the directional flow.
 • Pluto trine MC (orb 2°) – indicating profound transformational influences affecting career or public engagements.
 • Additional aspects (Moon square Ascendant, Ascendant square IC and MC, Jupiter square Ascendant) add depth to the tension between personal needs and public or external expression.

4. Patterns Observed
 • T‑Square Pattern: Involving the MC in Gemini, your Ascendant in Virgo, and the IC in Sagittarius, with additional input from Jupiter and the Moon in Gemini. This pattern highlights tension between your personal identity, public action, and deep-rooted issues.
 • Cradle Pattern: Formed by the MC in Gemini, the IC in Sagittarius, Pluto in Aquarius, and Venus in Aries. This pattern underscores the nurturing potential of transformational and relational energies within the reading.

5. Special Features and Modal Emphasis
 • The chart shows a Bowl shape with dominance of the Air element among the inner planets and a prevalence of Mutable mode.
 • Most inner planets are located in the top hemisphere (indicating outward expression) and in the right hemisphere (east of the MC-IC axis), which is significant in horary analysis for active communication.
 • The Moon in Gemini (naturally mutable and communicative) is in conjunction with Jupiter, reinforcing its supportive role in expediting communication.

6. House Cross-Reference
 • Your Ascendant (1st House) is your personal self.
 • Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th House according to your cross-reference. In your chart, the 9th House begins at 29° Aries and, based on the provided data, contains Uranus (23°17′ Taurus), a planet associated with sudden, unconventional actions and insights.

7. Timing and Communication Indicators
 • Mercury (ruler of communication) in Aquarius in your 6th House (work and daily routines) in conjunction with the Sun emphasizes the potential for clear, timely conversation.
 • The Moon’s strong conjunction with Jupiter in Gemini (10th House) fortifies the expectation of expansive and emotionally significant communication.
 • The tension from Mars (action) square Chiron (healing) may introduce delays, suggesting that while communication is highly charged, there might be hesitancy or a need for careful timing before making a decisive outreach.

The above data forms the foundation for interpreting your horary query concerning when Stefan will next reach out with a meaningful conversation about your connection. Further analysis would integrate the relative timing techniques (such as planetary hours or activation of the chart’s dynamic aspects) to provide a precise time frame if available.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Here is the step‐by‐step interpretation based solely on the horary chart data and traditional horary principles:

1. The Ascendant (8°23′ Virgo) defines your personal approach. The query asks when Stefan (represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house matters) will next initiate a meaningful conversation.

2. Uranus in Taurus appears in the Ascendant’s 9th house. Uranus is volatile and unpredictable; its involvement suggests that Stefan’s communication might come suddenly, prompted by an unexpected insight or circumstance.

3. The Moon, located in Gemini in the 10th house, is in close conjunction with Jupiter (orb 1°). This supports the idea of an expansive, emotionally significant outreach. The Moon’s fast motion indicates that shifts in the situation occur rapidly.

4. Mercury in Aquarius in your 6th house (the house of daily work and routine) is supported by a sextile to Chiron. This aspect encourages healing, honest communication and speaks directly to the potential for a conversation that addresses wounds or unresolved feelings.

5. Sun conjunct Mercury (orb 2°) reinforces clarity and direct communication. This index of intentional dialogue combined with the Moon/Jupiter conjunction suggests that when Stefan does act it will be with considerable clarity and a desire to clarify the underlying issues.

6. The tension from Mars square Chiron (orb 1°) alludes to internal conflicts or hesitancy regarding the readiness to speak openly. This implies that there may be transient delays caused by unresolved emotional wounds, yet they are being processed.

7. The Cradle Pattern involving Venus (in Aries in the 8th house) and Pluto (in Aquarius in the 5th house) indicates transformative energy regarding relational matters. Although the energies are intense, they encourage eventual outreach when the stars align to resolve tension.

8. The T‑Square among key points in the chart points to a conflict between personal needs (Ascendant), public or outward expression (MC in Gemini), and deeply held, sometimes subconscious issues (IC in Sagittarius). The dynamic means that final resolution (the meaningful conversation) will occur when the disruptive influences (Uranus in the 9th) and the need for clarity (Mercury/Sun) align harmoniously.
